page.title: 07Morecambe Golf Club
page.content: The present home of Morecambe Golf Club is situated between Happy Mount Park and Hest Bank along Coastal Road adjacent to Morecambe Bay and overlooked by the Lakeland Hills.The railway line from London to Glasgow runs behind the course.Although the present course has undergone all sorts of rearrangements in its 50 odd years of existance,it has never lost its reputation of being an interesting course with a sound test of play.Alterations to the club have produced a modern building.The men's captain is M.B.Price and the captain for the ladies is Mrs D. Hartly.It is an 18 hole course.The golf shop sells golf shoes,golf balls and other golf equipment.
